FuncDef:
The timestamp-unit command sets the unit of timestamps for an NQA UDP jitter test instance.
The undo timestamp-unit command restores the default unit.
The unit of timestamp for NQA test instance is millisecond by default.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the unit of timestamps for an NQA test instance to millisecond.
-

Sets the unit of timestamps for an NQA test instance to microsecond.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After you enable an interface board to send packets, to set the unit of timestamp for NQA test instances, run the timestamp-unit command.
Prerequisites
The hardware-based enable command has been run to enable the hardware forwarding function before the timestamp-unit microsecond command is run.
